name: A flamehardened ring
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution slightly.
It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
